title: MPH: Russell deal leaves Mercedes F1 door ajar for Verstappen
summary: George Russell will drive for Mercedes in 2026 but behind the announcement of their renewed F1 commitment, both sides are looking at alternative options

qa_pairs.question: Which team is George Russell contracted to drive for in 2026?
What potential future consideration is mentioned regarding Mercedes F1?
What is the significance of George Russell's deal for Mercedes in the context of driver lineup?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It indicates a commitment to their current drivers while considering future changes.
wrong_options: It means they will only focus on young drivers
It confirms the departure of Lewis Hamilton
It guarantees a championship win in 2026
